Tavatron watches Dinobot through the thick foliage, her optics glowing a 
soft blue:

*Hmmmm, this seems almost too easy.* Tavatron shrugs, *You take what you can 
get.*

Tavatron charges through the brush. She raises her staff above her head and 
brings it down across Dinobot's back. Not hard enough to do any real damage, 
but hard enough to knock him to the ground.

(I wasn't sure of any other way to do this, but if I'm making your character 
take damage, then I'm sorry.)

>From: "Carnage darkness" <carnage_blood@...>

>* Dinobot grabs Suukie quickly and covers his mouth with a clawed hand, he
>snarls at him in a whisper.*
>
>" Quiet, Fool! You must keep still, I am hunting!"
>
>* Dinobot lets go of Suukie go and continues to stalk through the forest,
>the mist is now thinned and swirls around his ankles. He snarls as he looks
>through the trees, she was here somewhere!!*
